title: Deep Within
description: An ancient evil is reborn, and now it's determined to stay alive.More praise for Bram Stoker Award® nominated author of THE LEGEND OF THE PUMPKIN THIEF. "DEEP WITHIN will have you sitting on the edge of your seat. Charles Day takes his readers on a well-written thrill ride that they'll never forget!" -Tonya Hurley New York Times and international bestselling author of the ghostgirl series and Precious Blood and Passionaries of THE BLESSED trilogy.Great book. Very cinematic. Charles Day should shop this to movie studios and production companies. He delivers sheer terror with Deep Within. Your fingers are going to be mighty sore from turning pages so quickly!” – Bram Stoker Award-winner Michael Knost, author of Return of the Mothman.
author: Charles Day
